tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_data (
  date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type VARCHAR(100),
  weight_kg DECIMAL(10,2),
  recycled BOOLEAN,
  CONSTRAINT pk_waste_disposal_data PRIMARY KEY (date, location)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection (
  collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  collection_date DATE,
  collection_location VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type ENUM('Recyclable', 'Organic', 'Non-Recyclable'),
  weight_kg DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE recycling_centers (
  center_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  center_name VARCHAR(255),
  center_location VARCHAR(255),
  accepted_materials TEXT,
  center_capacity DECIMAL(12, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Waste_Management (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  waste_type TEXT,
  weight INT,
  disposal_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Recycling_Programs (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Waste_Trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name TEXT,
  trend_description TEXT,
  trend_date DATE,
  trend_results TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Waste_Generation (
  generation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  generation_type TEXT,
  generation_date DATE,
  generation_amount INT,
  generation_location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE WasteBins (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  capacity INT,
  type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE WasteCollection (
  collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bin_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  collection_weight FLOAT,
  collected_by TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RecyclingMaterials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name TEXT,
  material_category TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE WasteTrends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_date DATE,
  waste_generation FLOAT,
  recycling_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE CollectionRoutes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name TEXT,
  route_distance FLOAT,
  assigned_driver TEXT
)
